Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service

Interface JobApplicationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
JobApplicationServiceImpl
public interface JobApplicationService
This interface represents the service contract for handling JobApplications at Buffett Inc. It declares all the necessary CRUD operations related to JobApplication along with some additional methods.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5

  • Method Details

    • saveOrUpdateJobApplication

      JobApplication saveOrUpdateJobApplication(JobApplication jobApplication)
      Saves a new job application or updates an existing one.
      Parameters:
      jobApplication - the job application to save or update.
      Returns:
      the saved or updated job application.

    • getJobApplicationById

      Optional<JobApplication> getJobApplicationById(UUID applicationID)
      Fetches a job application by its id.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - the id of the job application to fetch.
      Returns:
      an Optional of the job application if found, or an empty Optional if not.

    • getAllJobApplications

      List<JobApplication> getAllJobApplications()
      Fetches all job applications.
      Returns:
      a list of all job applications.

    • deleteJobApplication

      void deleteJobApplication(UUID applicationID)
      Deletes a job application by its id.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - the id of the job application to delete.

    • getJobApplicationsByStatus

      List<JobApplication> getJobApplicationsByStatus(JobApplication.JobApplicationStatus status)
      Fetches all job applications by their status.
      Parameters:
      status - the status of the job applications to fetch.
      Returns:
      a list of job applications with the given status.

    • getJobApplicationsForJobOpening

      List<JobApplication> getJobApplicationsForJobOpening(UUID jobOpeningID)
      Fetches all job applications for a particular job opening.
      Parameters:
      jobOpeningID - the id of the job opening.
      Returns:
      a list of job applications for the job opening.

    • getJobApplicationsByApplicant

      List<JobApplication> getJobApplicationsByApplicant(UUID applicantID)
      Fetches all job applications submitted by a particular applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicantID - the id of the applicant.
      Returns:
      a list of job applications submitted by the applicant.
